#The blog is live !
More to come in the near future. I am testing this new platform called Hugo to publish a static site. The workflow is very interesting and it applies a series of templates and rules to a markdown file. It’s definitely something new that I have never tried before but I am willing to put time and effort to learn this new platform. Github offers an amazing integration that allows to host a static site for free ftom one of your repository, more to come.
